lead_paragraph: The layoffs, while small given Disney’s sheer size, have followed a pattern in recent months as the company tries to move fast to control costs.

headline.print_headline: Disney Cuts 250 Jobs in Consumer Products and Digital Unit
headline.main: Disney Cuts 250 Jobs in Consumer Products and Digital Unit
